## Source: ossf-package-analysis (9582f8c7828335bcf6299260ea76656239fbbc52addbad1db96f04025109ead7)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'pyyaml-selenium' @ 1.15.3 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
